post.body:
Our Vancouver based client is looking for an experienced Software Engineer, if you are interested in finding out more about the role, including the company follow the job link below or contact us directly.

http://myservco.com/31337/node/40


Who is 31337 Recruiters?

We are experienced recruiters working exclusively in the gaming industry. Based in Vancouver BC Canada home to over 80 studios including EA, Vivendi, Rockstar, 2K, Next Level, Disney and many more. With experience across the board in Art, Coding, Production and Management roles we are uniquely positioned to aid in almost any category or job search.

Who we represent?

We are an independent agency which is extremely important to your career. As an independent we represent multiple studios which gives you a choice in employers and broad representation across the industry. Unlike studio recruiters pushing there opportunities as the only available choice, we aim to match you with the right opp not the only one.


Jared Shaw
Lead Recruiter
31337Recruiters.com
Vancouver, BC
Ph.778-868-6800
Mail: jared@31337recruiters.com
